directions.text: Cut up nectarines into ½ inch size pieces.
Gently toss nectarines, raspberries, ½ cup sugar in a bowl and let sit for 20 mins.
Keep 2 TBSP fruit juice from bowl then drain fruit in a colander.
Toss fruit with &frac12 tsp lemon zest, 1½ tsp lemon juice, cornstarch, a pinch of salt and 1 TBSP more sugar.
